meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a wife.
meanings.sent1: Her caring and nurturing nature made her very wifelike.
meanings.sent2: She cooked dinner every night, wifelike and devoted.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly referred to his favorite chair as his wifelike companion.
meanings.sent4: The cozy cottage had a wifelike charm that welcomed all who entered.
meanings.sent5: The old photo captured a wifelike smile on her face, radiating warmth.

meanings.definition: In a manner typical of a wife.
meanings.sent1: She cared for her children wifelike, always putting their needs first.
meanings.sent2: He managed the household finances wifelike, ensuring everything was in order.
meanings.sent3: The dog followed him around wifelike, hoping for a treat.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed wifelike in the garden, adding color to the yard.
meanings.sent5: She organized the event wifelike, making sure every detail was perfect.
